weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, an early summer day unfolds under a sun that gleams with a gentle warmth. The atmosphere is predominantly clear, inviting the light of the sun to gently illuminate the cityscape. With a high forecast of around 66 degrees, temperatures will gradually settle to a cooler 62 in the afternoon, making for a comfortably mild experience. A subtle southwest wind, whispering through the streets at a speed of up to 14 mph, contributes a refreshing touch, offering a pleasant contrast to the warmth of the sun. 

As the day progresses, the remnants of fog flirt at the fringes, hinting at the classic San Francisco marine layer that effortlessly drapes itself over the Golden Gate, creating a picturesque scene, even if it fails to envelop the city. In this delightful clearness, clothing that balances warmth with breathability—a light jacket paired with layers—is advised for those venturing out, ensuring that one is prepared as the sun begins to dip toward the horizon. Today's idyllic weather fosters a peaceful spirit, perfect for leisurely strolls along the waterfront or quiet moments in a serene café, where one might savor a late morning coffee and watch the world go by, appreciating the subtle rhythm of urban life.
